TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapExtension extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services 的 SOAP 扩展的基类。

span.span: The base class for SOAP extensions for XML Web services created using ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 允许通过扩展性机制构建与 SOAP 相关的基础结构。ASP.NET allows a SOAP-related infrastructure to be built by means of an extensibility mechanism. ASP.NET SOAP 扩展体系结构围绕一个扩展，可以在客户端或服务器上的消息处理的特定阶段检查或修改消息。The ASP.NET SOAP extension architecture revolves around an extension that can inspect or modify a message at specific stages in message processing on either the client or the server. ASP.NET SOAP 扩展派生自 类。ASP.NET SOAP extensions derive from the class. 和 方法提供了用于初始化 SOAP 扩展以提高性能的替代机制。The and methods provide alternative mechanisms for initializing the SOAP extension to enhance performance. 是大多数 SOAP 扩展的核心，因为在 中定义的每个阶段都调用方法，从而允许 SOAP 扩展执行该特定 SOAP 扩展所需的行为。 is the heart of most SOAP extensions, as the method is called at each stage defined in , allowing the SOAP extension to perform the desired behavior of that specific SOAP extension. 对于需要修改 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应的 SOAP 扩展， 提供接收要通过网络发送的建议数据的机会。For SOAP extensions that need to modify the SOAP request or SOAP response, provides an opportunity to receive the proposed data to be sent across the wire. ## Examples 以下 `TraceExtension` SOAP 扩展在应用于 XML Web service 方法时将 SOAP 请求和 SOAP 响应输出到指定的文件。The following `TraceExtension` SOAP extension outputs the SOAP request and SOAP response to a specified file when applied to an XML Web service method. 如果安装了以下 SOAP 扩展以使用 XML Web service 运行，ASPNET 用户帐户必须具有写入日志文件的目录的权限。If the following SOAP extension is installed to run with an XML Web service, the ASPNET user account must have permission to write to the directory in which the log file is written. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展访问包含 SOAP 请求或响应的内存缓冲区。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension access to the memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.

returns.span: ，它表示此 SOAP 扩展可以修改的新内存缓冲区。

span.span: A representing a new memory buffer that this SOAP extension can modify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确保具有最高优先级的 SOAP 扩展可以修改最接近发送或通过线路返回的 SOAP 消息的实际数据。 ensures that SOAP extensions with the highest priority can modify the actual data closest to the SOAP message sent or returned over the wire. SOAP 扩展应保存传递到 中的 的引用以及从 返回的 。SOAP extensions should save references of the passed into and the returned from . 如果 SOAP 扩展配置为使用 XML Web service 方法运行，则传入到 的 包含 中的序列化 SOAP 请求。If the SOAP extension is configured to run with a XML Web service method, the passed into contains the serialized SOAP request at the . 同样，在序列化发生时，从 返回的 引用会写入到中，因此在 中包含序列化的 SOAP 响应。Similarly, the reference returned from is written into when the serialization occurs and thus contains the serialized SOAP response in the . ## Examples 下面的示例将分别传递到 中的 和从成员变量中的 返回 `oldStream` 和 `newStream`。The following example saves both the passed into and the returned from in the member variables `oldStream` and `newStream`, respectively. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展以一次执行的成本初始化特定于 XML Web services 方法的数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to an XML Web service method at a one time performance cost.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (serviceType As Type) As Object

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 实现应用 SOAP 扩展的 XML Web services 的类的类型。

span.span: The type of the class implementing the XML Web service to which the SOAP extension is applied.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展以一次执行的成本初始化特定于实现 XML Web services 的类的数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to a class implementing an XML Web service at a one time performance cost.

returns.span: ，SOAP 扩展将对其进行初始化以用于缓存。

span.span: The that the SOAP extension initializes for caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用的 的重载取决于 SOAP 扩展的指定方式。The overload of that gets called by ASP.NET depends on how the SOAP extension was specified. 可以通过两种方法来指定 SOAP 扩展：There are two methods for specifying a SOAP extension: - 将从 派生的自定义属性应用于单个 XML Web service 方法。Apply a custom attribute, deriving from , to the individual XML Web service method. - 在 web.config 或 app.config 配置文件中添加引用。Add a reference in either the web.config or app.config configuration files. 如果添加对其中一个配置文件的引用，SOAP 扩展将针对该配置文件范围内的所有 XML Web 服务运行。If you add a reference to one of the configuration files, the SOAP extension runs for all XML Web services within the scope of that configuration file. 通过引用配置文件指定 SOAP 扩展时，ASP.NET 会调用传入 的 重载。When specifying, a SOAP extension by referencing a configuration file, ASP.NET invokes the overload that passes in a . 通过应用自定义属性指定扩展时，ASP.NET 会调用传入 和 的 。When specifying an extension by applying a custom attribute, ASP.NET invokes the that passes in a and a . 有关将 SOAP 扩展添加到配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web Services 的配置选项](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b2c0ew36(v=vs.100))。For details on adding SOAP extensions to a configuration file, see [Configuration Options for XML Web Services Created Using ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b2c0ew36(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码演示了如何根据每个 XML Web service 来保存特定于 SOAP 扩展的数据。The following code demonstrates how one can save SOAP extension specific data on a per XML Web service basis. 如果使用配置文件而不是属性配置了 SOAP 扩展，SOAP 扩展可以存储应用 SOAP 扩展的每个类的数据。If the SOAP extension is configured using a configuration file instead of an attribute, the SOAP extension can store data for each class to which the SOAP extension is applied. 此示例保存一个文件的名称，在该文件中，将根据实现 XML Web service 的类的名称将发送到 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 消息记录到缓存中。This example saves the name of a file in which to log the SOAP messages sent to and from the XML Web service method based on the name of the class implementing the XML Web service into the cache. 此代码示例是 TraceExtension SOAP 扩展的完整代码示例的一部分，可在 类概述中找到。This code example is part of a full code example for a TraceExtension SOAP extension that can be found in the class overview. [!code-cpp[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/CPP/traceextension.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/CS/traceextension.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/VB/traceextension.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo, attribute As SoapExtensionAttribute) As Object

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，它表示应用 SOAP 扩展的 XML Web services 方法的特定函数原型。

param.span: 应用于 XML Web services 方法的 。

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展以一次执行的成本使用应用于 XML Web services 方法的特性来初始化特定于 XML Web services 方法的数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to an XML Web service method using an attribute applied to the XML Web service method at a one time performance cost.

returns.span: ，SOAP 扩展将对其进行初始化以用于缓存。

span.span: The that the SOAP extension initializes for caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用配置文件配置 SOAP 扩展，请参见接受 重载。If the SOAP extension is configured using a configuration file see the overload that accepts a . SOAP 扩展有三个用于初始化数据的机会，它们都具有不同的用途：A SOAP extension has three opportunities to initialize data and they all have different purposes: - 类构造函数-每次实例化 SOAP 扩展并通常用于初始化成员变量时，都会调用类构造函数。Class constructor - The class constructor is called every time a SOAP extension is instantiated and is typically used to initialize member variables. - 但是，在首次向 XML Web services 方法发出 SOAP 请求时， - 只调用一次。 - , however, is called just once, the first time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web services method. 如果将自定义属性应用于 XML Web service 方法，将调用 方法。If a custom attribute is applied to the XML Web service method, the method is invoked. 这样，SOAP 扩展就可以询问 XML Web service 方法的 ，以获取原型信息或访问从 派生的类所传递的特定于扩展的数据。This allows the SOAP extension to interrogate the of an XML Web service method for prototype information or to access extension-specific data passed by a class deriving from . 返回值由 ASP.NET 缓存并传入后续 方法。The return value is cached by ASP.NET and passed into subsequent methods. 因此，在 中完成的初始化实质上会被封装到一次性性能方面。Therefore, initialization done in is encapsulated essentially into a one-time performance hit. - 每次向 XML Web service 方法发出 SOAP 请求时都会调用 - ，但与类构造函数相比，在 中初始化的 会传递到该方法。 - is called every time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web service method, but has an advantage over the class constructor, in that the initialized in is passed to it. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用派生自 的类来获取中传递的 SOAP 扩展特定的数据，然后将这些数据缓存到 中。The following code demonstrates how you can obtain SOAP extension-specific data passed in using a class that derives from , and then cache that data in . 此代码示例是 `TraceExtension` SOAP 扩展的完整代码示例的一部分，可在 类概述中找到。This code example is part of a full code example for a `TraceExtension` SOAP extension that can be found in the class overview. 此代码示例依赖于传入 `attribute` 参数的 `TraceExtensionAttribute`。This code example relies on a `TraceExtensionAttribute` being passed into the `attribute` parameter. 在完整的代码示例中，`TraceExtensionAttribute` 派生自 并添加 `Filename` 属性，这是缓存中 存储的内容。In the full code example, `TraceExtensionAttribute` derives from and adds a `Filename` property, which is what stores in the cache. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Sub Initialize (initializer As Object)

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展使用缓存于 方法中的数据初始化其自身。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize itself using the data cached in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 扩展有三个用于初始化数据的机会，它们都具有不同的用途：A SOAP extension has three opportunities to initialize data and they all have different purposes: - 类构造函数-每次实例化 SOAP 扩展并通常用于初始化成员变量时，都会调用类构造函数。Class constructor - The class constructor is called every time a SOAP extension is instantiated and is typically used to initialize member variables. - -在首次向 XML Web services 方法发出 SOAP 请求时，只调用一次此方法。 - This method is called just once, the first time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web services method. 如果将自定义属性应用于 XML Web service 方法，将调用 方法。If a custom attribute is applied to the XML Web service method, the method is invoked. 这样，SOAP 扩展就可以询问 XML Web service 方法的 ，以获取原型信息或访问从 派生的类所传递的特定于扩展的数据。This allows the SOAP extension to interrogate the of an XML Web service method for prototype information or to access extension-specific data passed by a class deriving from . 返回值由 ASP.NET 缓存并传入后续 方法。The return value is cached by ASP.NET and passed into subsequent methods. 因此，在 中完成的初始化实质上会被封装到一次性性能方面。Therefore, initialization done in is encapsulated essentially into a one-time performance hit. - -每次向 XML Web service 方法发出 SOAP 请求时都会调用此方法，但对类构造函数具有优势，因为在 中初始化的 会传递到该方法。 - This method is called every time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web service method, but has an advantage over the class constructor, in that the initialized in is passed to it. > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用配置文件中的[\ 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c)，添加不从 派生的 SOAP 扩展。You can also add a SOAP extension without deriving from by using the [\ Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c) in a configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[\ 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c)和[使用 Soap 扩展修改 soap 消息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95)。For details, see [\ Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c) and [SOAP Message Modification Using SOAP Extensions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法期间缓存的数据。The following example demonstrates how you can use the data cached during the method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Sub ProcessMessage (message As SoapMessage)

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展接收要在每个 中处理的 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to receive a to process at each .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于应用到使用 ASP.NET 和客户端创建的 XML Web services 的所有 阶段，都将调用 。 is called at all stages for SOAP extensions applied to both XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients. 在每个 ，从 派生的类的实例将传递给 。At each , an instance of a class deriving from is passed to . 如果 SOAP 扩展在 XML Web service 客户端上运行，则 对象将传递到 ;否则，会传入一个 对象。If the SOAP extension is running on the XML Web service client, then a object is passed into ; otherwise a object is passed in. ## Examples 下面的示例是用于记录 SOAP 请求和 SOAP 响应的 SOAP 扩展的 部分。The following example is the portion of a SOAP extension that logs SOAP requests and SOAP responses. 通过记录 的 ，SOAP 扩展会访问要通过网络发送的 。By logging the at the , the SOAP extension accesses the to be sent over the wire. 如果 SOAP 扩展应用到使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web service 方法，则 包含 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 响应。If the SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET, then the contains the SOAP response from the XML Web service method. 如果 SOAP 扩展应用于 XML Web service 的客户端，则 包含对 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 请求。If the SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, the contains the SOAP request to an XML Web service method. 经典 SoapExtension. ProcessMessage 示例 # 1Classic SoapExtension.ProcessMessage Example#1
